程序包 org.hibernate.validator.internal.constraintvalidators.bv

Implementations of the Bean Validation built-in constraints.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AssertFalseValidator
    Validates that the value passed is false
    AssertTrueValidator
    Validates that the value passed is true
    DecimalMaxValidatorForCharSequence
    Check that the character sequence (e.g. string) being validated represents a number, and has a value less than or equal to the maximum value specified.
    DecimalMinValidatorForCharSequence
    Check that the character sequence (e.g. string) being validated represents a number, and has a value greater than or equal to the minimum value specified.
    DigitsValidatorForCharSequence
    Validates that the character sequence (e.g. string) being validated consists of digits, and matches the pattern defined in the constraint.
    DigitsValidatorForNumber
    Validates that the Number being validated matches the pattern defined in the constraint.
    EmailValidator
    Checks that a given character sequence (e.g. string) is a well-formed email address.
    MaxValidatorForCharSequence
    Check that the character sequence (e.g. string) validated represents a number, and has a value less than or equal to the maximum value specified.
    MinValidatorForCharSequence
    Check that the character sequence (e.g. string) being validated represents a number, and has a value more than or equal to the minimum value specified.
    NotBlankValidator
    Check that a character sequence is not null nor empty after removing any leading or trailing whitespace.
    NotNullValidator
    Validate that the object is not null.
    NullValidator
    Validate that the object is null
    PatternValidator  

程序包org.hibernate.validator.internal.constraintvalidators.bv的说明

Implementations of the Bean Validation built-in constraints.
